mission_data.mission_description: Be a Pirate. Collect Loot. Watch out for the Patrols. Fly a Ximni Jumpship and try to score the most Loot in 50 minutes. Don't let your bounty get too high. (This Version has No Videos) Loot values are Random

big_message.title: Dawn Patrol 2.0

event.name: Briefing
event.incoming_comms_text: Argg. Go out there and get us some loot. Don't raise to much trouble though, we don't want any of those patrols following you back here. But we will pay you for any loot you... Aquire... Just deliver them back here. We will provide commodity updates every 10 mins

event.name: Commodities Report
event.incoming_comms_text: Commodities Report: Black Market Value^Holocron Disk: |Holocron_Disk_Value|^Dragon Egg: |Dragon_Egg_Value|^Crytritium Crystals: |Crytritium_Crystals_Value|^Arvonian Artifact: |Arvonian_Artifact_Value|^Space Whale Sushi: |Space_Whale_Sushi_Value|^Arvonian Ale: |Arvonian_Ale_Value|

event.name: Shamoo Defend
event.incoming_comms_text: Unidentified Vessel stand down or you will be fired upon! Cease Hostilites and leave the area!

event.name: Eternis Shield Defend
event.incoming_comms_text: Unidentified Vessel stand down or you will be fired upon! Cease Hostilites and leave the area!

event.name: INC Enforcer Defend
event.incoming_comms_text: Unidentified Vessel stand down or you will be fired upon! Cease Hostilites and leave the area!

event.name: TSN Atlantian Defend
event.incoming_comms_text: Unidentified Vessel stand down or you will be fired upon! Cease Hostilites and leave the area!

event.name: Arvonian Task Force
event.incoming_comms_text: To all vessels, A decree from the Matriarch. Pirating will no longer be tolerated. A bounty has been post for all pirating ships Dead or Alive. Justice will be delivered and order will be restored in this sector.

event.name: Bounty Message
event.incoming_comms_text: Arrg! There is a Bounty out on you. Our sensors picked up a fleet of ships head our way. If they find us you'll have to defend us if you want operations to continue in this sector.

event.name: Arvonian Bounty Update
event.incoming_comms_text: Watch out, the Arvonian Bounty on your head is high. If you destroy one more Arvonian Ship they will send a task force out to destroy us!

event.name: Terran Bounty Update
event.incoming_comms_text: Watch out, the Terran Bounty on your head is high. If you destroy one more Terran Ship they will send a task force out to destroy us!

mission_data.event:
>
To all vessels, Pirating will no longer be tolerated. A bounty has been post for all pirating ships Dead or Alive. Justice will be delivered and order will be restored in this sector.

event.name: Skaraan Task Force
event.incoming_comms_text: To all vessels, Pirating will no longer be tolerated. A bounty has been post for all pirating ships Dead or Alive. Justice will be delivered and order will be restored in this sector.

event.name: Skaraan Bounty Update
event.incoming_comms_text: Watch out, the Skaraan Bounty on your head is high. If you destroy one more Skaraan Ship they will send a task force out to destroy us!

event.name: Torgoth Task Force
event.incoming_comms_text: To all vessels, Pirating will no longer be tolerated. A bounty has been post for all pirating ships Dead or Alive. Justice will be delivered and order will be restored in this sector.

event.name: Torgoth Bounty Update
event.incoming_comms_text: Watch out, the Torgoth Bounty on your head is high. If you destroy one more Torgoth Ship they will send a task force out to destroy us!

event.name: Posiden's Bounty Surrender
event.incoming_comms_text: We surrender. Just don't hurt my crew. Fly along side us and we will transfer our cargo.

event.name: Archimedes Surrender
event.incoming_comms_text: We surrender. Just don't hurt my crew. Fly along side us and we will transfer our cargo.

event.incoming_comms_text: We surrender. Just don't hurt my crew. Fly along side us and we will transfer our cargo.

event.incoming_comms_text: We surrender. Just don't hurt my crew. Fly along side us and we will transfer our cargo.

event.incoming_comms_text: We surrender. Just don't hurt my crew. Fly along side us and we will transfer our cargo.

event.incoming_comms_text: We surrender. Just don't hurt my crew. Fly along side us and we will transfer our cargo.

event.name: Steely Bulldogger Surrender
event.incoming_comms_text: We surrender. Just don't hurt my crew. Fly along side us and we will transfer our cargo.

event.name: Concrete Force Surrender
event.incoming_comms_text: We surrender. Just don't hurt my crew. Fly along side us and we will transfer our cargo.

event.name: Juiced Devil Surrender
event.incoming_comms_text: We surrender. Just don't hurt my crew. Fly along side us and we will transfer our cargo.

event.name: Iron Hide Surrender
event.incoming_comms_text: We surrender. Just don't hurt my crew. Fly along side us and we will transfer our cargo.

event.name: Kraw's Mark Surrender
event.incoming_comms_text: We surrender. Just don't hurt my crew. Fly along side us and we will transfer our cargo.

event.name: Juno's Path Surrender
event.incoming_comms_text: We surrender. Just don't hurt my crew. Fly along side us and we will transfer our cargo.

event.name: Cargo Holocron Disks
event.incoming_comms_text: Those are some mighty fine "Holocron Disks" we picked up. I've been fixing to watch so holo programing of the "exotic" variety. Our cargo hold is full we should head back to Dragon Tooth Refuge off and sell this contraband.^Cargo: Holocron Disks

event.name: Cargo Dragon Egg
event.incoming_comms_text: This will make one enormous omelette! Could provide breakfast for an entire colony or one very wealthy patron with a large appetite. Our cargo hold is full we should head back to Dragon Tooth Refuge off and sell this contraband.^Cargo: Dragon Egg

event.name: Cargo Crytritium Crystals
event.incoming_comms_text: Oooo, I like Shiny things. Maybe I could keep a little piece. Our cargo hold is full we should head back to Dragon Tooth Refuge off and sell this contraband.^Cargo: Crytritium Crystals

event.name: Cargo Arvonian Artifact
event.incoming_comms_text: A piece like this belongs in a museum. Or on your ready room shelf for the right price. Our cargo hold is full we should head back to Dragon Tooth Refuge off and sell this contraband.^Cargo: Arvonian Artifact

event.name: Cargo Space Whale Sushi
event.incoming_comms_text: This Grade A whale meat pairs nicely with a light Arvonian Ale, but don't tell the Arvonians that. Our cargo hold is full we should head back to Dragon Tooth Refuge off and sell this contraband.^Cargo: Space Whale Sushi

event.name: Cargo Arvonian Ale
event.incoming_comms_text: hic:: Not sure what happen with that last pick up captain. ::hic:: Our cargoss holds arez full we should head backz .....^Cargo: Arvonian Ale

event.name: Cargo Trade Delegation
event.incoming_comms_text: The Trade Delegation is...Comfortable. But the sooner we drop them off the better. I can't take the continuous complaining.^Cargo: Trade Delegation

event.name: Cargo Wreck
event.incoming_comms_text: We sifted through the pieces of the wreck and found the Black box for the Profit's Desire as well as a surprising number of teeth. This should be enough proof for the TSN.^Cargo: Profit's Desire Wreck

event.name: Drop Cargo Holocron Disks
event.incoming_comms_text: Excellent Holocron Disks! We will fetch a good price for these after a private viewing that is. Bring us back more loot and we'll pay you hansomely
Your Loot Score is |Loot_Score|

log.text: Holocron Disk Sold for |Holocron_Disk_Value| Loot Score = |Loot_Score|

event.name: Drop Cargo Dragon Egg
event.incoming_comms_text: How did you get a hold of a Dragon Egg! Guess that little ship of yours has a few surprises. We will fetch a good price for this. Bring us back more loot and we'll pay you hansomely.
Your Loot Score is |Loot_Score|

log.text: Dragon Egg Sold for |Dragon_Egg_Value| Loot Score = |Loot_Score|

event.name: Drop Cargo Crytritium Crystals
event.incoming_comms_text: Blistering Broadsides these Crytritium Crystals are fit for the Royal Arvoinian queen herself! We will fetch a good price for these minus my commision of a few crystals. Bring us back more loot and we'll pay you hansomely.
Your Loot Score is |Loot_Score|

log.text: Crytritium Crystals Sold for |Crytritium_Crystals_Value| Loot Score = |Loot_Score|

event.name: Drop Cargo Arvonian Artifact
event.incoming_comms_text: I never much understood Arvonian Art, but some Terran Captains love displaying this stuff in there ready rooms. We will fetch a good price for this. Bring us back more loot and we'll pay you hansomely.
Your Loot Score is |Loot_Score|

log.text: Arvonian Artifact Sold for |Arvonian_Artifact_Value| Loot Score = |Loot_Score|

event.name: Drop Cargo Space Whale Sushi
event.incoming_comms_text: I don't know what's worse, Arvonians burying this Grade A Space Whale meat on an Asteriod in some Spiritual ritual, or the Torgoths who order this at a restaurant well done. Either way the highest bidder will decide. We will fetch a good price for this. Bring us back more loot and we'll pay you hansomely.
Your Loot Score is |Loot_Score|

log.text: Space Whale Sushi Sold for |Space_Whale_Sushi_Value| Loot Score = |Loot_Score|

event.name: Drop Cargo Arvonian Ale
event.incoming_comms_text: Gulp, Gulp, Gulp. Sorry I have to check the merchandise, to make sure its authentic. You understand right. hic. We will fetch a good hic price for this. hic. Bring us back more loot..... hic
Your Loot Score is |Loot_Score|

log.text: Arvonian Ale Sold for |Arvonian_Ale_Value| Loot Score = |Loot_Score|

event.name: Drop Cargo Trade Delegation
event.incoming_comms_text: Good work. We have secured the Trade Delegation and are already in negotiations with the Arvonians. They have agreed to pay the ransom for these delegates. Though there is a considerable bounty on your head now.
Your Loot Score is |Loot_Score|

log.text: Trade Delegation Ransomed for |Trade_Delegation_Value| Loot Score = |Loot_Score|

event.name: Drop Cargo Wreck
event.incoming_comms_text: Sometimes Hostages just aren't worth the trouble. TSN has already sent the funds under the table. They would prefer we never speak of this again.
Your Loot Score is |Loot_Score|

event.name: Dragon Alert
event.incoming_comms_text: AHHH. That last Dragon Egg hatched! Help we have a baby dragon on the loose.

set_ship_text.name: Profit's Desire
set_ship_text.hailtext: Unidentified Vessel leave the area or our escorts will open fire.

event.name: Trade Delegation Briefing
event.incoming_comms_text: Our contacts have picked up some intriguing information. An Arvonian Trade delegation is passing through the sector for an important trade meeting with the Skaraans. The Terran Stellar Navy wants to interfere with those negotiations but not publicly. They will pay 6 Galactic Credits for the destruction of the delegation's ship. However, If the Delegates were captured and ransomed I think we could get better value of 18 Galactic Credits from the Arvonians.
To capture the Trade Delegation you must force the ship to surrender then deliver us the escape pod.

event.name: Profit's Guard 1 Defend
event.incoming_comms_text: Unidentified Vessel stand down or you will be fired upon! Cease Hostilites and leave the area!

event.name: Profit's Guard 2 Defend
event.incoming_comms_text: Unidentified Vessel stand down or you will be fired upon! Cease Hostilites and leave the area!

event.name: Profit's Desire Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: We Detected and Explosion in your vicinity and can no longer find Profit's Desire on Sensors. Pick up some scrap from the wreck that we can give to the TSN as proof for payment.

event.name: Profit's Desire Surrendered
event.incoming_comms_text: We Surrender! We have put the Trade Delegation in an Escape Pod. Take them and leaves us alone. The Arvonians will hear of this. You won't get away with this!

event.name: Trade Delegation Escape Briefing
event.incoming_comms_text: Our sensors indicate that Profit's Desire has left the sector with the Trade Delegation

event.name: Profit's Guard 1 Escape
event.incoming_comms_text: Our sensors indicate that Profit's Guard 1 has left the sector

event.name: Profit's Guard 2 Escape
event.incoming_comms_text: Our sensors indicate that Profit's Guard 2 has left the sector
